options.name: Daily Action : Death Touch
options.description: You touch a creature using your dark magic skill as an attack roll against a defensive endurance check. For each dice that hits, deal dark damage equal to your missing health. This does not affect constructs or elementals but deals double damage to humanoids and plantoids.

options.name: Action : Harvest
options.description: You siphon the magic from one undead creature under your command that is within a moderate [20 units] range, recovering 2d4 health and completely restoring your stamina.

options.name: Life Siphon
options.description: When you kill a creature with a spell from the necromancy subschool, you gain health back equal to your highest roll on your spell check.

options.name: The Dark Arts
options.description: You are practiced in the dark arts. Gain +1 skill with dark magic.

options.name: Forbidden Science
options.description: You have experience with forbidden sciences. Gain +1 skill in medicine and +1 skill in academics.
